mapper.select: SELECT COUNTRY_CD, VOIVODESHIP_CD, CITY_CD, STREET_CD, BUILDING_NUMBER_CD, FLAT_NUMBER_CD FROM clientcontactdetails
mapper.update: UPDATE clientcontactdetails SET COUNTRY_CD = #{countryCD}, VOIVODESHIP_CD = #{voivodeshipCD}, CITY_CD = #{cityCD}, STREET_CD = #{streetCD}, BUILDING_NUMBER_CD = #{buildingNumberCD}, FLAT_NUMBER_CD = #{flatNumberCD} WHERE CLIENT_KEY_ID =#{client_key_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clientcontactdetails (COUNTRY_CD, VOIVODESHIP_CD, CITY_CD, STREET_CD, BUILDING_NUMBER_CD, FLAT_NUMBER_CD, CLIENT_KEY_ID) VALUES (#{countryCD}, #{voivodeshipCD}, #{cityCD}, #{streetCD}, #{buildingNumberCD}, #{flatNumberCD}, #{client_key_id});
